category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IDSM_do_not_resend_up_to_date_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether Teamcenter must prevent the retransmission of a replicated file that is still current at the time an attempt to reimport or resend the file is made. Set this preference value to TRUE to prevent retransmission. This preference applies whether or not transfer of site ownership is involved. If no value is set for the preference, Teamcenter always retransmits the files. If this preference value is set to TRUE at a site, instruct the site's users not to delete replicas if they intend to reimport the object. This can cause new metadata but without the required file. If a missing file occurs, temporarily disable this preference, reimport the dataset, and then enable the preference. Valid Values: TRUE - Prevents the retransmission of up-to-date files. FALSE - Allows the retransmission of up-to-date files.
